LanguageData.JRWYangchuanosaurus.label: Yangchuanosaurus
LanguageData.JRWYangchuanosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0498-1978 [YANGCHUANOSAURUS SHANGYOUENSIS] CODENAME: LAZULI >472
A metriacanthosaurid theropod with a spotty blue hide. They are a fierce predator, their huge size allowing them to overpower many different species of prey.
